text: Alor Pongsu (Chinese: 亚罗邦士) is a small town in Kerian District, Perak, Malaysia. This small town is located 8 kilometres from Bagan Serai town. Notable people from this megacity is Pak Ngah Kayat.http://www.utusan.com.my/berita/nasional/5-247-mangsa-banjir-di-perak- tengah-1.43395 ==References== Category:Towns in Perak
title: Alor Pongsu
